    • Constructor Detail

      • DataSet

        public DataSet(java.lang.String fileName)
        Constructor - specifies the number of the available time series in the data set (i.e. the "line number") and the length of the single time series, which is assumed to be the same for all series.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The location of the physical file.

                                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Reads a subset of the selected lines.
        Parameters:
        lineIDs - The ID's of the selected lines.
        seriesLength - Defines the desired length of the subset.
        Returns:
        A list of series values and a label (SeriesWithLabel).

        java.io.IOException
